name: Hey ma i'm a Dragon Now
name_original: Hey ma i'm a Dragon Now
description:
2D pixel Adventure Game featuring side-scrolling bullet hell.
where you play through 8 different levels
featuring custom music and cutscenes and there's nine unique bosses.
buy upgrades and power-ups to power
through hordes of enemies move your cursor and left click to fire bullets
while pushing the up key to keep your character in the air and dodging bullets.
